entries.title: Make Your Mark
entries.body: The Abstrakt and Raptor Outfits are in the Item Shop now!

entries.title: Submachine Gun - Available Now!
entries.body: New standard SMG with a fast rate of fire and reduced accuracy penalty while moving.

entries.title: Save the World 50% OFF!
entries.body: Push back the storm in this four-player co-op PVE campaign! Build forts, craft weapons, and level-up your Heroes.

entries.title: Stay Fly
entries.body: Flytrap and Fortnite Fever Gear in the Item Shop now!

entries.title: Submachine Gun - Coming Soon!
entries.body: New SMG weapon with a fast rate of fire and improved mobility.

entries.title: Conquer The Storm
entries.body: New Magnus Outfit and Forebearer Pickaxe available now!

entries.title: On The Edge
entries.body: New Moniker Outfit and Sharp Style Gear available now!

entries.title: On The Edge
entries.body: New Moniker Outfit and Sharp Style Gear available now!

entries.title: Season 5 Battle Pass
entries.body: 100 tiers. Over 100 rewards. New toys, outfits, gliders, pickaxes, emotes, and more! Available now for 950 V-Bucks!

entries.title: Season 5 Is Here!
entries.body: Viking ships, desert outposts, and ancient statues have appeared across the island. Hop into an ATK and uncover all new locations!

entries.title: Toying Around
entries.body: Challenge your friends to a game of golf or basketball with toys, available only in the Battle Pass!

entries.title: Venture And Victory
entries.body: Venture and Goalbound Gear sets are in the shop now!

entries.title: Playground LTM - Last Day!
entries.body: Let your creativity run wild on your own private island!

entries.title: From The Shadows
entries.body: Nevermore and Jailbird Gear sets are in the shop now!
